mapper.update:
update client_invoice_template
client_user_id = #{clientUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tax_identification_number = #{taxIdentificationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credit_code = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_address = #{regAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_telephone = #{regTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update client_invoice_template set client_user_id = #{clientUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_identification_number = #{taxIdentificationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_code = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_address = #{regAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_telephone = #{regTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT cit.id as id, cit.invoice_title as title, cit.company_name as companyName, cit.tax_identification_number as number, cit.credit_code as creditCode, cit.bank as bank, cit.bank_account as bankAccount, cit.reg_address as regAddress, cit.reg_telephone as regTelephone, cit.create_time as createTime, cit.remark as remark FROM client_invoice_template cit JOIN client_user cu ON cit.client_user_id = cu.id WHERE cit.invoice_type = #{invoiceType} AND cu.client_user_code = #{clientUserCode} ORDER BY cit.create_time DESC
